title: Ephemeral Truths

panel_structure.description: The yellow brick road fractures into fragments of light, each piece representing a different state of consciousness, the Architect's form shifting between solid and vapor
Truth-bubbles containing miniature universes of understanding bloom and wither in seconds, the horizon breathing with possibility and mortality
Evan's shadow stretches impossibly long, touching both past and potential futures, while sunrise threatens to evaporate all the night's revelations
